description: This green quiche laden with herbs and with thin slices of fresh goat cheese baked on top has a Gallic rusticity A proper quiche (also known as a tarte salée, or savory open pie) should have really good pastry and contain a soft, tender eggy custard It should be light enough to serve as a first course, or in larger portions for a simple main course
title: Quiche With Herbs and Goat Cheese
title_page: Quiche With Herbs and Goat Cheese Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
This green quiche laden with herbs and with thin slices of fresh goat cheese baked on top has a Gallic rusticity. A proper quiche (also known as a tarte salée, or savory open pie) should have really good pastry and contain a soft, tender eggy custard. It should be light enough to serve as a first course, or in larger portions for a simple main course. It should be something to sing about.
Featured in: Quiche Goes On A Diet And Relearns French.
Learn: How to Make Quiche
